name: Crash Course (henrymattinglyUCSC)
description:
Crash Course is a multiplayer demolition derby game for up to 8 players. Players each control a car, collect power-ups and try to destroy each other's cars at the junkyard. After a set amount of time, the game becomes a free for all, and the last player standing wins.

No two matches will be the same. Change the physics of your car to be the best and destroy the rest.

-------------------------------------------

To play the game using multiplayer

Disclaimer:  Unfortunately, we are having trouble getting the multiplayer to work properly.

-------------------------------------------

Step 1: Download the entire file and extract them from the zip

Step 2: Open steam and add the game to your steam library (bottom left you can add non-steam games to your library)

Step 3: Add the Crash Course exe file 

Disclaimer: Your antivirus will probably not like this game. You have to make an exception in your antivirus to allow the game to run.

Step 4: Press play on the game on Steam

To join a friend

Step 5: After pressing play in Steam and the title screen loads, press play, but do not press host   (unless you are hosting the lobby)

Step 6: Pull up your friend list and press “join game” under your friend's profile
